tool_description: Creates mathematical models of measurement functions for uncertainty propagation analysis, handling complex dimensional measurement equations and relationships.

input_variables.description: Names of input variables in equation

equation_type.description: Type of equation: linear, polynomial, exponential, trigonometric

error_messages: Invalid equation syntax: Mathematical equation contains syntax errors or unsupported functions.
Variable count mismatch: Number of input_variables must match variable_values.
Undefined variables: Equation contains variables not defined in input_variables list.
Division by zero: Equation evaluation results in division by zero at nominal values.
Complex equation type: Equation too complex for automatic sensitivity coefficient calculation.
Non-physical result: Equation produces negative or infinite result at nominal conditions.
usage: Provide measurement equation, variable names, and nominal values. Tool creates mathematical model for sensitivity analysis and uncertainty propagation.

nominal_result.description: Result of equation at nominal variable values

linearization_accuracy.description: Accuracy of linear approximation as percentage
